channel.title: Xlog Need help of some good coders
channel.description: Hello guys i need to know how to make a timer so if you close your game interface you don't log out 10 sec in game anyone got the codes for me ty.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 02:22:20 pm[/size][hr]No one knows this?:S

item.title: Xlog Need help of some good coders
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:4, topic:259845”]I don’t get it. What is this ‘Game interface’ you speak of.
If you mean, closing the client and you’re still logged in, that’s impossible.[/quote] Yes that is possible i saw some server with a timer so if you logout you stay logged in for 10 sec’s in fight you know…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 02:25:42 pm[/size][hr]No one helps why ?:S because i see a lot of servers in devlopment with xlog fixed…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2009, 09:24:25 am[/size][hr]Ffs no one gets this…

Read full topic
